content: introducing the evangeline christmas angel crochet pattern a delightful project that will bring a touch of holiday magic to your home decor this easy-level pattern is perfect for crocheters looking to create a charming angel figurine evangeline stands at 7 inches tall excluding her halo and measures 4 inches wide when standing with a beautifully detailed skirt the pattern is worked in the round and includes clear written instructions for seamless construction this pattern is sure to inspire creativity and festive cheer **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels detailed instructions for seamless construction adorable angel design perfect for holiday decorations worked in the round for a polished finish **materials needed-** yarn bernat super value solids new in aran weight 71 yards hook 4mm us size 6 0 gauges 5 stitches x 5 row = 1 inches in single_crochet 5 stitches by 5 row = 1 inches in single_crochet **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram
